name: pot_on_stove
description: True if the pot is on the stove.

name: pot_burner_on
description: True if the stove burner under the pot is on.

name: water_in_pot
description: True if water has been added to the pot.

name: water_boiling
description: True if water in the pot is boiling.

name: noodles_in_pot
description: True if noodles are in the pot of boiling water.

name: noodles_cooked
description: True if noodles are cooked through.

name: noodles_drained
description: True if noodles have been drained.

name: cabbage_prepared
description: True if cabbage is chopped.

name: garlic_prepared
description: True if garlic is peeled and cut.

name: spring_onions_prepared
description: True if spring onions are cut.

name: celery_prepared
description: True if celery is cut.

name: pan_on_stove
description: True if the pan/skillet is on the stove.

name: pan_burner_on
description: True if the stove burner under the pan/skillet is on.

name: oil_in_pan
description: True if oil has been added to the pan.

name: aromatics_in_pan
description: True if aromatics (garlic, onions, etc.) have been added to the pan.

name: noodles_in_pan
description: True if drained noodles have been added to the pan.

name: sauce_in_pan
description: True if sauce (e.g., soy sauce) has been added to the pan.

name: stir_fry_cooked
description: True if all ingredients in the pan are combined and cooked.

name: food_on_plate
description: True if the final dish has been transferred to a plate.

name: gaze_target
description: Estimate target of the operator's gaze. Should be 'null' if it is not clear.

name: steps_completed
description: The names of all actions from the Task Graph that have been successfully completed.

name: steps_in_progress
description: The name of actions from the Task Graph that are currently being executed. Should be empty if the operator is idle

name: steps_available
description: A list of names of actions from the Task Graph that can be started next, based on satisfied predecessors.

name: immediate_next_step
description: The name of the action from the Task Graph that will likely be performed immediately after the current action.

name: current_step
description: Natural language description of the current micro-action being performed

name: next_step
description: Natural language description of the next micro-action which will be performed immediate after current step
